name: PickleLand
description:
PickleLand is an arcade game featuring a post-apocalyptic cyberpunk city full of evil pickles 

We have created all the art and the music of the game except the background (Luis Zuno @ https://www.patreon.com/posts/urban-landscape-3445404).

Proudly developed by:

Jennifer Hernández Bécares (https://github.com/jhbecares)

Viktor Jacynycz García (https://github.com/Jacynycz)

Get the source code and all the assets at:

https://github.com/jhbecares/pickleland
